result.arabic_text: ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ وَٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلۡمُنفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُسۡتَغۡفِرِينَ بِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ
result.translation: Abihanganira kuguma bakora ivyiza bitegetswe bakiyubara gucumura, imvugakuri, abicisha bugufi ku Mana Allah, abatanga mw’ibanga no ku mugaragaro hamwe rero n’abatakamba basaba imbabazi mu bucagucagu.
